ygData.subject: RE: That continent thing...
ygData.msgSnippet: Not to be a party pooper again Golias, but that s cause they had to break up the 40 zones because they found out early on that they couldn t handle the load
ygData.messageBody:
Not to be a party pooper again Golias, but that's cause they had to break up
the 40 zones because they found out early on that they couldn't handle the
load with the larger zones. That's why some zones have such ridiculous name
codes now. They used to be all one zone and breaking them up they just
slapped on whatever came to mind.

Kit

From: Mike.Langlois@...



Golias, the official LoreKeeper of Trivial Items, would like to mention...


I've seen the gripe about Verant releasing only 3 continents out of 5, and
how
that somehow relates to them being lazy/not delivering on their promises.

For those that didn't slavishly follow the game before beta and release, nor
read the chat logs with Brad and group, here's the scoop.

The original spec said 5 continents with 40 zones. They shipped with 3
continents and over 70 zones.

Just, FYI.

Golias "Fortune and Glory" LoreBoy
